data.prayer: Please, convict the 39,467 believers in P‘yŏngyang, North Korea to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of P‘yŏngyang, North Korea
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of P'yŏngyang.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 63 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of P‘yŏngyang, North Korea.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, help the 39,467 believers in P'yŏngyang to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Korean people. Make the Korean people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, comfort those who mourn in P‘yŏngyang, North Korea.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call P‘yŏngyang, North Korea into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 2,473,024 lost people in  P‘yŏngyang, North Korea have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

location.name: P'yŏngyang
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Mandarin, Deaf, Mongol, Khalka
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Han Chinese, Mandarin (182,000), Deaf (258,000), Mongol, Khalka (36,000)
